So in the proportiona Pravapara explains, the Brahmastras are finer than the nuclear weapons. This has been discussed earlier. Ashwatthama discharged the Brahmastra simply to kill the Pandavas, namely the five brothers headed by Maharaja Yudhishtira, and their only grandson was lying within the womb of Uttara, so the target of this Brahmastra which was released by Ashwatthama were six personalities: the five Pandavas and the only surviving descendant of the Pandavas, the grandson of Arjuna, that is Pariksit in the womb of his mother Uttara. Therefore, the Brahmastra, more effective and finer than the atomic weapons, was not as blind as the atomic bombs, even though a comparison is made here that the Brahmastra is something like a nuclear weapon or atomic bomb, but actually it is not blind.
